name: Dev-Eh-Roo-Yeh
description:
My Submission for the Game Dev Unlocked game Jam!

Inspired by old escape the room games and a popular sci-fi movie from the 90's - Help a certain individual escape his fate... Or can he?

Controls:

Move - W,S,A,D

Move Objects - Left Click

Gas Mask Equip/Unequip - Hold G

Inventory - Tab

Interact - E

Back: Right Click

Pick-up: Left Click/Walk-Over

Have fun!!
